modName: Skyrim Logo Intro Movie with Dragon Roar
summary: Replace the intro movie by skyrim logo movie with sound effect
descriptionHtml:
The idea of this intro movie is based on \"Bethesda Logo replace\" by flash789
Visit his file here: [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2016]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2016[/url]

I get the video resource from skyrim 1080p trailer and the sound effect from skyrim game.

Updated new verson of intro with different sound effect.

V2.0
[youtube]n_G24prHrx8[/youtube]

V1.0
[youtube]YtF4pywNYSY[/youtube]


btw..the sound efftect got some distortion on youtube. it would be better in game.

[b]install[/b]
place \"BGS_Logo.bik\"  file into \\Skyrim\\Data\\Video\\ folder
*Please backup the oringe file, just in case!*

[b]uninstall[/b]
Remove the file and replace the oringal file back into folder.
author: Regmax
